events.title: Xi and Putin hold first Moscow summit after Xi takes office
events.summary: Xi Jinping and Vladimir Putin held talks in Moscow, Russia during Xi Jinping's first Russia visit after taking office.
events.impact: The meeting signaled continued Sino-Russian strategic coordination, affecting U.S.-China-Russia triangle risk assessment and policy signaling.

events.impact: The meeting signaled continued Sino-Russian strategic coordination, affecting U.S.-China-Russia triangle risk assessment and policy signaling.
